author: Outraged_Texan
title: Comment on The REAL Bundy Ranch Story: The People Forced the Feds to Surrender by Outraged_Texan
text:
Home / Be The Change / The REAL Bundy Ranch Story: The People Forced the Feds to Surrender The REAL Bundy Ranch Story: The People Forced the Feds to Surrender 
April 14, 2014 
Here is the video you WILL NOT SEE on the mainstream media. 
The BLM did NOT simply “leave” and return the Bundy cattle. They were going to KEEP the cattle — until a group of brave patriots and cowboys from 7 Western states stood up to sniper guns and FORCED the release themselves. 
David Knight described as being like “something out of a movie,” supporters of Nevada cattle rancher Cliven Bundy advanced on a position held by BLM agents despite threats that they would be shot at, eventually forcing BLM feds to release 100 cattle that had been stolen from Bundy as part of a land grab dispute that threatened to escalate into a Waco-style confrontation. Share Google + Outraged_Texan 
The Bundy’s are nothing but greedy thieves. Tax evasion is a crime, that land belongs to me (among others) and they are stealing my taxes. They know the law, they need to obey it. Social
